trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZC015_03398_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> At the sight of you, the exuberant pixie's eyes light up with recognition.
TEXT_LUCKZC015_03398_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the whirlweeds to the exuberant pixie.
TEXT_LUCKZC015_03398_PIXIE03398_000_000<tab>Oh! You're Urianger's friend, aren't you? Will you not lend me a hand?

TEXT_LUCKZC015_03398_PIXIE03398_000_001<tab>You see, Urianger's home is drab and dull, and I've a mind to decorate it, make it bright and beautiful. If you were to help out, it'd make it all the more special!

TEXT_LUCKZC015_03398_PIXIE03398_000_002<tab>First of all, we need some whirlweeds, a pretty little plant that grows in the water. We usually trade with the Fuath for it, but seeing as you can swim, you can harvest some for us.

TEXT_LUCKZC015_03398_PIXIE03398_000_003<tab>You should be able to find the weed in the lake where there's a sunken church. While you take care of this, I'll go and pick us lots and lots of beautiful flowers!
TEXT_LUCKZC015_03398_PIXIE03398_000_004<tab>Afterwards, let's meet back here for the decorating. See you soon!
TEXT_LUCKZC015_03398_PIXIE03398_000_010<tab>There you are! Did you manage to find the whirlweeds?
TEXT_LUCKZC015_03398_PIXIE03398_000_011<tab>Oho, look at these lovelies! I'll enchant these at once, make it so they can grow outside the water, and then plant them here and there.
TEXT_LUCKZC015_03398_PIXIE03398_000_012<tab>Meanwhile, I want you to decorate with these snugblooms.
TEXT_LUCKZC015_03398_PIXIE03398_000_013<tab>As to where they should go... Ah, yes, the stairs! That's a dull spot that's ripe for some cheer. When you've finished, come and let me know!
TEXT_LUCKZC015_03398_PIXIE03398_000_020<tab>Tee hee hee! Marvelous! This is sure to put a smile on Urianger's scowly face!
TEXT_LUCKZC015_03398_PIXIE03398_000_021<tab>And then he'll want to stay here, forever and ever and ever! You're welcome to stay too, of course? There's plenty of room for you and aaall your friends!
